results.title: AT&T Revenue 2015-2024
results.content: * Revenue * Revenue # AT&T's Revenue AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$30.03 B**(Q1: Mar 2024), **$29.80 B**(Q2: Jun 2024), **$30.21 B**(Q3: Sep 2024), **$32.30 B**(Q4: Dec 2024) in fiscal year 2024. AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$30.14 B**(Q1: Mar 2023), **$29.92 B**(Q2: Jun 2023), **$30.35 B**(Q3: Sep 2023), **$32.02 B**(Q4: Dec 2023) in fiscal year 2023. AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$29.71 B**(Q1: Mar 2022), **$29.64 B**(Q2: Jun 2022), **$30.04 B**(Q3: Sep 2022), **$31.34 B**(Q4: Dec 2022) in fiscal year 2022. AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$43.94 B**(Q1: Mar 2021), **$35.74 B**(Q2: Jun 2021), **$31.33 B**(Q3: Sep 2021), **$31.10 B**(Q4: Dec 2021) in fiscal year 2021. AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$42.78 B**(Q1: Mar 2020), **$40.95 B**(Q2: Jun 2020), **$42.34 B**(Q3: Sep 2020), **$45.69 B**(Q4: Dec 2020) in fiscal year 2020. AT&T's quarterly revenue was **$44.83 B**(Q1: Mar 2019), **$44.96 B**(Q2: Jun 2019), **$44.59 B**(Q3: Sep 2019), **$46.82 B**(Q4: Dec 2019) in fiscal year 2019.
